attr.title: Yolk Heroes: A Long Tomago
attr.desc: A cute Tamagotchi idle game from 14 Hours Productions.
attr.inst: Purchase game from https://store.steampowered.com/app/2417850/?snr=1_5_9__205, rename the main .pck to "yolkheroes.pck" and add to the yolkheroes/gamedata/ directory. See https://portmaster.games/gptokeyb-documentation.html for details about Keyboard Text Entry.
